rooted: I design and develop high-performing, intuitive frontend interfaces with over 4 years of experience, collaborating with Swiss and international teams to deliver digital projects.

404.title: This page doesn't exist but maybe it's here to remind you of something.

texts.heading: Spend more time outside.
texts.desc: Whether it's a workout, a picnic with friends, or just a walk to clear your head. Fresh air resets your mind and brings new energy.

texts.heading: Focus on one thing, and do it with intention.
texts.desc: Greatness isn't about doing everything, it's about doing what matters, really well.

texts.heading: Happiness is a choice.
texts.desc: Even when things don't go as planned (like landing on a 404 page), you can still smile, breathe, and see the good in it. Every “wrong turn” can lead to something unexpectedly beautiful.
